name: Engine
description: Motorcycle engine assembly including crankcases, cylinder heads, and internal components.

name: Intake
description: Intake system components such as throttle bodies, carburetors, and performance intake kits.

name: Fuelling
description: Fuel delivery components including injectors, fuel pumps, and fuel system upgrades.

name: Exhaust
description: Exhaust headers, silencers, and full aftermarket exhaust systems.

name: Transmission
description: Gearbox, clutch assemblies, and primary drive components.

name: Body
description: Bodywork, fairings, panels, screens, mirrors, and related hardware.

name: Chassis
description: Frame, subframe, and structural motorcycle components.

name: Suspension & Steering
description: Front and rear suspension assemblies including forks and rear shocks.

name: Braking System
description: Brake hardware such as calipers, master cylinders, and brake system upgrades.

name: Wheels & Tyres
description: Wheels, tyres, wheel bearings, hubs, and related mounting hardware.

name: Cables & Controls
description: Control cables and levers including throttle, clutch, brake, and choke assemblies.

name: Ignition
description: Ignition system components including coils, plugs, leads, and ignition modules.

name: Electrical & Control
description: ECUs, ignition systems, regulators, and electronic control components.
